summary: This is an internal email chain from July 2, 2020, congratulating a team on the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell. It highlights the significant effort required to build the case against her and mentions an upcoming press conference.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the email chain; her arrest is announced and she is described as 'very worthy of criminal prosecution'.

events.title: Arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested this morning. The email congratulates the team responsible for building the case.

events.title: Press Conference on Maxwell Case
events.description: A press conference is scheduled for 12:00 (presumably noon) regarding the charges against Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested on the morning of July 2, 2020.
The email emphasizes that the charges were not inevitable but resulted from 'extraordinary amount of work and perseverance and creativity' by a team.
The case is based on conduct described as older than the unit's paralegals.
A press conference regarding the case was scheduled for later that day.
